name: Twigsort
body:
##TWIGSORT ======== Twigsort bridges the highly fragmented design, specification and construction workflow for architects and interior designers. We want to replace your binder and catalogue library with a firm-specific, digital material database. A personalized Amazon for your products and materials - consolidating them in one place, making them searchable, and referencing them to your firm's projects. We would love to hear your feedback - send emails to andrea @ twigsort.com. If you would like get a message when we launch, please send us your email address below. ####Visualize | Sort | Compare
